items.title: Real-time Task Updates
items.description: Enable team members to see task changes instantly across all devices.
acceptance_criteria: When a task is updated by a user, all other team members see the change within 2 seconds.
Task status, assignee, and due date changes are reflected without requiring a page refresh.
non_functional: System should support up to 500 concurrent users without performance degradation.
Updates should have a latency of less than 2 seconds.

items.title: Team Chat Integration
items.description: Provide an in-app chat feature for team members to discuss tasks and projects.
acceptance_criteria: Users can send and receive messages in real-time within project-specific chat rooms.
Chat history is stored and retrievable for at least 90 days.
non_functional: Messages should be delivered with less than 1 second latency.

notes: The requirement was high-level and did not specify platforms (web, mobile) or integrations. Assumed core features include real-time updates and communication for collaboration.
